definition: 1,1-Dichloroethylene + NADPH + Oxygen + H+ <=> Chloroacetyl chloride + NADP+ + H2O

orthologs.K07415: cytochrome P450 family 2 subfamily E polypeptide 1 [EC:1.14.13.-]

name: 1,1-dichloroethylene, NADPH:oxygen oxidoreductase (RH-hydroxylating or -epoxidizing)

pathways.rn00980: Metabolism of xenobiotics by cytochrome P450
